      • SQLDAO

        public SQLDAO(Connection connection)
        The constructor every SQLDAO should have. Every SQLDAO needs a connection to a database.
        Parameters:
        connection - A connection object to a database

      • createNotifyForEventType

        protected void createNotifyForEventType(String table,
                                        String idField,
                                        int id,
                                        EventType notifyForEventType)
                                 throws DataAccessException
        Create a link from an object to an event type
        Parameters:
        table - The table in which we want to insert
        idField - The first field of the new record
        id - The Id of an object
        notifyForEventType - An event type which is important for this object
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - This is thrown when something went wrong with the database
